name: Christmas Tale - Visual Novel
description: Christmas tale - it's a short choice-based visual novel about two days before Christmas.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 1 GB available space
